member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Personalization.ICriterionEvaluator
member.summary: Defines the evaluator of personalization criterion.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Personalization.ICriterionEvaluator.IsMatch(System.String,Telerik.Sitefinity.Personalization.IPersonalizationTestContext)
member.summary: Determines if the current user is a match for the given criterion.
member.param: The serialized settings with which the criterion has been configured.
Personalization test context populated by the personalization test console.
member.remarks: Use the testContext.IsInTestMode property to determine if evaluation is running in the test mode.
member.returns: True if the criterion is matched; otherwise false.

member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Personalization.ICriterionValidator
member.summary: Validates whether the criterion settings are still relevance and up-to-date.
member.remarks: To plug in validation for a certain criterion, register a named implementation of this interface in the container using the criterion name as a name.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Personalization.ICriterionValidator.Validate(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Validates whether the settings stored in the criterion value are still relevant and up-to-date.
member.param: The serialized settings with which the criterion has been configured.
The display name with which the criterion has been configured.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Personalization.ICriterionValidator.IsAvailable
member.summary: Determines whether this instance is available.
member.returns: Whether the criterion is available in personalization module.

member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Personalization.CriterionValidationResult
member.summary: Represents the result of criterion value validation ().

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Personalization.CriterionValidationResult.IsValid
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the criterion settings are valid.

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Personalization.CriterionValidationResult.ErrorId
member.summary: Gets or sets the error Id. Use this value differentiate between errors.

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Personalization.CriterionValidationResult.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets human readable message explaining the validation failure.

member.summary: Defines the personalization service.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Personalization.IPersonalizationService.GetUserSegment(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets the segment to which the current user belongs to.
member.param: The page data identifier.

member.summary: Gets the IDs of the segments used on the page to which the current context belongs to.
member.param: A lookup containing all segment ids used on the page grouped by control ID including from templates
A lookup containing segments used on the page grouped by control ID, only if the control is part of the page template
A collection with ids of controls that should be tracked (for which events should be raised).
QueryString keys to build the test context with them
Variable that indicates whether this method needs to fire any events
The url of the current page
member.returns: A dictionary where key is the control ID and value is the ID of a segment to which the current context belongs to and used for personalization of the control

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Personalization.IPersonalizationService.IsPagePersonalizationTarget(System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the page is a personalization target.
member.param: Id of the page site node.
Url of the page.
member.returns: True if page participates in at least one of personalization criteria; otherwise false.

member.summary: Gets the criteria editor control
